name: Minesweeper: HARD MODE
description:
Welcome to Minesweeper: HARD MODE! This game is only for the most experienced of critically-thinking Minesweeper players, so if that's not you, then turn back now. This bad boy features everything you'd expect from a version of Minesweeper for the elite few, and so much more. So buckle up, because you're in for the most intense puzzle night of your life...

*Note: After heavy consideration, I have decided to add an Easy Mode for those less-adept players to have a chance at clearing a board or two. It will never be the same experience as the original intended difficulty, so I highly encourage you to try that first, and only to switch to the newly added difficulty if you find yourself struggling too much.
